lead_paragraph: HARRIS--Douglas James, died early in the morning of June 30, 2016, succumbing to complications during treatment for Acute Myeloid Leukemia. Doug was a lifelong New Yorker, having been born in Yonkers and enjoying the last 16 years of his life in Rye. He was employed by IBM for close to 40 years, rising to the level of Managing Director in the Global Financial Services Sector of the company. He is survived by his wife of 27 years, Darby, and his two daughters, Elizabeth and Caroline. His sister Diane and his mother Shirley, both in Texas, also survive him. Memorial tributes may be made to Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center in New York, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HARRIS, DOUGLAS JAMES
